ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 543
ygData.msgSnippet: That doesn t work. I have known several friends who either gave up or were never looking who were most pleasantly surprised. I don t know any who were
ygData.messageBody:
That doesn't work. I have known several friends who either gave up or
were never looking who were most pleasantly surprised. I don't know
any who were surprised in this way who regretted the partner who came
their way. More happy than those I have know who were so desperate
for a mate that they made unwise choices.

If you are content with your own company, then whatever way things go
you shall do well.

Barto Proudfoot

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Su" <suceress@k...> wrote:
> I've just given up on finding a mate period. Oh wait, I was never
trying to
> begin with so I guess you couldn't call it giving up. Heh.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > atleast you have a mate to share you addiction with
> > I have given up trying to find a mate that does not
> > understand EQ
> > I only look for a mate that can share my addiction :p
> > I look everywhere, far and wide
> > I am on Antonius bayle, looking for a good european wife, I
> > will move anyplace in the world for a mate, and inhouse
> > network :p
> > so we can play together
> > cuddle together
> > be best of friends
> > and **censored**
> > in that order of importance
> > hmmmmm
> > I always said people had a problem when they put there drug
> > of choice before sex
> > hmmmmm
> > either I am seriously addicted or just getting old :(
> >
> >
> >
> > --- Orion <orionv@c...> wrote:
> > > Of course you are...:> My wife and I have our mains on
> > > The Trib...Mine is a level 50 Ogre Shaman hers is a level
> > > 51 Ogre Warrior. We have 33 characters over 5 servers so
> > > join the addiction club...:> Ain't it great...heheh
> > >

> > > From: Dr Scurrilous PhD

> > >

> > > Still do not have a character over 36

> > > including stormhammer
> > > am I addicted???
> > > maybe :p
> > >
> > >

> > > >
